dosageInstruction.text: Take 5 mg by mouth 1 (one) time each day., Historical Med
dosageInstruction.patientInstruction: Take 5 mg by mouth 1 (one) time each day.

dosageInstruction.text: Take 0.5 mg by mouth 1 (one) time each day. Do not crush, chew, or split., Historical Med
dosageInstruction.patientInstruction: Take 0.5 mg by mouth 1 (one) time each day. Do not crush, chew, or split.

dosageInstruction.text: Take 1,000 mg by mouth 1 (one) time each day., Historical Med
dosageInstruction.patientInstruction: Take 1,000 mg by mouth 1 (one) time each day.

dosageInstruction.text: Take 5 mg by mouth 2 (two) times a day., Historical Med
dosageInstruction.patientInstruction: Take 5 mg by mouth 2 (two) times a day.
